attributes.action: Make the wearing of cycling helmets compulsory for all cyclists on public roads
attributes.additional_details: There are many studies supporting the wearing of helmets, and assessing how many injuries are prevented but no research to find where a helmet has caused an injury.
attributes.background: Wearing a cycling helmet can help prevent serious injury in the event of falling or being knocked off a bicycle. This a long with education and road safety programmes will make cycling safer for all.
